text: Burrton USD 369 is a public unified school district headquartered in Burrton, Kansas, United States. The district includes the communities of Burrton, Patterson, and nearby rural areas. ==Schools== The school district operates the following schools: * Burrton Middle/High School * Burrton Elementary School ==See also== * Kansas State Department of Education * Kansas State High School Activities Association * List of high schools in Kansas * List of unified school districts in Kansas ==References== ==External links== * Category:School districts in Kansas Category:Education in Harvey County, Kansas
title: Burrton USD 369
